messages.title: I'M BACKING JAMES
messages.content: Supporters' reasons for backing James Baggaley, focusing on small businesses and care provision issues.

messages.title: ABOUT JAMES BAGGALEY
messages.content: Information about James Baggaley's background, including his work in Newark building a community hub, working with schools, and organising campaigns around affordable housing and youth services.

messages.title: It's time for real change
messages.content: "I speak to families across the constituency who say the same thing – the system isn't working. It's time for real change. I will be that change and fight for our communities."

housing.content: Information about James Baggaley's background includes organising campaigns around affordable housing.

leaflet.personalStatement: "I speak to families across the constituency who say the same thing – the system isn't working. It's time for real change. I will be that change and fight for our communities."

contactInformation.address: Flat 1 Fieldfare Cottage, Thoroton, Nottingham NG13 9DS

images.caption: Images of James Baggaley and supporters, including campaigning moments and James' professional portrait.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet includes a reply slip with questions for constituents and options to volunteer or engage with the campaign.
